subject: HEAD OF FOREIGN OPERATIONS D
body:
HEAD OF FOREIGN OPERATIONS DEPARTMENT.
Good Day,
Re: instruction to credit your account with the sum of
US$11,500,000.00.This is to notify you that your over due inheritance
funds has been Gazetted to be released to your bank account within
48hrs, via key-telex transfer (KTT).Mean while, a man came to my
office this morning with a letter of Authorization from you, claiming
to be your true  representative.
Here are his information:
Name  MR. JOHNSON CAMPBELL SR.
Bank name:Credit Unions  Bank in New York
Account number: 6503809428.
Please, do re-confirm to this office, As a matter of urgency if this
man is truly from you so that The Government, Executive, Board of
Directors or our bank / my office will not beheld responsible for
paying into the  wrong Account. The reserve bank governor, executive,
board of directors and the senate committee for foreign over due
Inheritance/contract  fund have approved and accredited this reputable
bank with the office of the director, international remittance, to
handle and transfer of all foreign inheritance/contract funds this
last quarter payment schedule  of  the year,2022.
However, we shall proceed to issue all payments details to the said
Mr. JOHNSON CAMPBELL, if we do not hear from you within  the next 4
working days from today; this fund will be transferred to the account
of JOHNSON CAMPBELL.Meanwhile, you are advice to get back to us
immediately to this office with the below information.
Your full name:telephone numbers: home address:Bank Name:Bank account
details (were the fund will be transferred into)This fund will be
remitted into your bank account within 72hrs as soon as you confirm to
us that you did not send the above  name to claim your fund on your
behalf, make sure that you get back to us with your above requested
information unless you  are sure that you send Mr. Johnson to claim
the fund on your behalf.
Yours Sincerely,
Dr Mathew Jacob.
LONDON
HSBC

subject: Re:   HEAD OF FOREIGN OPERATIONS D
body:
Hello Dr. Mathew Jacob,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my overdue funds. I appreciate the update and your prompt attention to this matter. However, I must admit that I am a bit confused about the situation.

I did not send anyone named Mr. Johnson Campbell Sr. to claim the funds on my behalf. This is the first time I am hearing about him. Could you please provide more information about this individual? How did he come to possess a letter claiming to be from me?

Additionally, could you clarify the process of transferring the funds to my bank account via KTT? What are the necessary steps I need to take in order for this transfer to be completed successfully?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Katelyn
